title: What are your five favorite skins?
body:
So we all know how fun skins can be. They give us a new way to look at a champ, and allow for alternate interpretations of the character. So what are your five favorite skins? It'd be awesome to hear what they are, and what your reasons are for liking them. You don't have to limit it to one skin per champ, just so you know. You also don't have to own the skin.


Here are mine:

5: Traditional Trundle
http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/2/21/Trundle_Traditional_Screenshots.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/613?cb=20150508234801

So I'm a trundle fan. Don't actually have him yet, but I like his gameplay. I also hate his theme. They traded a cool, unique character for a typical "but he was smarter than the rest" backstabbing minion character. I also hate that I didn't like him back when we likely last saw traditional trundle go on sale. It's an awesome skin that plays with the theme of rot and disease, a character type sorely lacking in leauge. Sure, we got Nasus, but he's more curses than rot. Unfortunately, Traditional Trundle still has some particles from his base skin, which clash with the rest of him, so he places lower on the list.

4: Spirit guard Udyr

https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQ-GIYyuNygcJjpe-cmwxdf0ZaO-GAMDIl9fNe1IqfL3Eql7G04

Another skin I unfortunately lack, Spirit guard udyr does great justice to this awesome champ. With his evolving models and animal spirits, Udyr never looked better.


3: Heartseeker Quinn

https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Htn91IFOf5w/WGxJhMHZWyI/AAAAAAAAbOo/Y7yiLj1an8Ed3ktvYMfkRZuTeqY89E5wwCLcB/s1600/quinnfront.jpg

Quinn is just a fun champ. I love split-pushing with her, I love leaping around with her, I love blinding with her, I love when you hit that w and tell your team that shaco is coming and they beat that little #### into hte ground. You know what makes her better? Being able to do this with a big-ass dove carrying her around the rift. This skin is fun and has a very different take on Quinn, and it's all for the better. While she doesn't look as good as early in the PBE, she still looks awesome in this skin, and has effects and sounds to match, earning her my #3 spot.


2: Elementalist Lux

https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQRH78_AKD4KHcnWiRS3Pon_AuRFMyst4A7_YJ5ZqhMpQxVorey

This is an awesome skin, and it was worth every penny. The forms have distinct feels, and each brings a new effect to the table, making games look flashier the longer they go on. I especially love the water and storm forms. It's a shame that water doesn't link into storm, but it's ok. I still got Mystic for when I want to mess around.


1: Star Guardian Jinx

https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQSG7-dZPw7xEgzhYchgNaDmAZQ2Kk3IEfn--8uhP196MN7AHdB

If you know me personally, you know I love Jinx. Not in that way. I still have some pride. But she's seriously an awesome champ. Awesome design, awesome gameplay, fun personality, etc. Now take all that and slap it into the magical girl genre, and you get the best skin in league of legends. She has awesome new particles, an amazing voice-over, the best non-canon shiptease, and snazzy animations. They manage to perfectly capture the awesomeness of Jinx but with a new feel and the most realistic work ethic ever. "We're on a mission! Just don't remember what." We all are, Jinx. We all are.


Those were my favorite skins, but I'm far more interested in hearing what yours are!

replies.body:
Captain Fortune - showed players the REAL Sarah Fortune
Pulsefire Ezreal - opened the floodgates for sci-fi skins
Surprise Party Fiddlesticks - community idea that felt like a celebration for players and Riot and the only skin to ever get custom Ability Icons
DJ Sona - totally unique experience
Gentleman Cho'gath - this skin makes you tilt proof, it's just too fun. Could put Nunu Bot here too.

Shoutout to Black Alistar, Rusty Blitzcrank, King Rammus and Pax TF for the OG cred.

Do you guys have any plans for updating Pulsefire Ezreal? It's the first ultimate skin that garnered a lot of hype for it and that now it's 4-5 years old.
It's also one of my favorite skins.
Supercakes talks about it [here](http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2016/11/ask-riot-the-one-about-pulsefire-ezreal/).
With that in mind, and the work that went into Gatekeeper Galio, do you think we might ever see other legendary updates too?
Champion Update did a great job with GG, so if you let the team know you want more I'm pretty sure they'll keep going with future reworks.

GentlemanChoGathGentlemanChoGathGentlemanChoGathGentlemanChoGathGentlemanChoGathGentlemanChoGath


SQUEEEEEEEE!

I'm *SO* looking foreward to that! <3
Honestly, the whole rework on GG just looks freaking amazing. Absolutely awesome!

Thanks for the heads up. I'm gonna be patient and excited at the same time for what's in store for that skin.
:)
I would add Brolaf to your Gentleman Cho'gath and Nunu bot.

captain miss fortune! good choice, sir! totally love this skin too!

https://cdna.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/001/857/170/large/ryu-caseim-max-view2.jpg?1453808809



http://www.sherv.net/cm/emoticons/hearts/beating-heart.gif http://www.sherv.net/cm/emoticons/hearts/beating-heart.gif
http://www.sherv.net/cm/emoticons/hearts/beating-heart.gif http://www.sherv.net/cm/emoticons/hearts/beating-heart.gif

My Favorites are:
1) Bloodstone Taric
https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-03Qlci8c6aQ/VwQi7zafWpI/AAAAAAAANEY/WrRuU21ktzsVyazN1g48MWtWiK_UFy8pA/s640/taric3turn.jpg
I actually hated this skin before his rework, it was ugly. When he became the most gorgeous man to walk the earth, this skin got dramatically better. I love the edgy, sexy vampire look he's got going on, and I especially love the stone embedded in his chest. For now, on my beloved, it will be my favorite until something cute comes along. *COUGH*STARGUARDIAN*COUGH*

2) Final Boss Veigar
http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-WVL6KpxHoH0/U-uvafYi8VI/AAAAAAAAVm4/-yUG7tC-1Y8/s1600/turnaround.jpg
I love the nerdy, video game voice over so much, as well as the awesome pixel VFX. I especially love the voice lines "ALL THE CAKE IS GONE!" and "HEY! LISTEN!"

3) Secret Agent Miss Fortune
http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-3Z08wMxTqRs/VZ4tOmyf7II/AAAAAAAAEu4/-Hcdaw8wA1I/s640/mf3turn.jpg
Of all of her skins, with the exception of Arcade, I think this one gives the most unique fantasy to Miss Fortune. I love the purple dress and the fact that you get to see her hair. The guns are nice too, in gold.

4) Star Guardian Janna
https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-W6W06yNjurc/V-GlJdB_H4I/AAAAAAAAUxc/Kww7wrzaTEMc7eydmJCy26ES8eaTQBW9wCLcB/s640/jannaturn.jpg
I love Janna, and I love magical anime girls. This look for Janna is fantastic, and I love the update look to her hair and the adorable particles. Plus, Zephyr is cute too. Brownie points for the start game and the recall music.

and

5) Ghost Bride Morgana
http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-3NLOiaIVxOU/VS9ZLQKwCrI/AAAAAAAACaU/icvrMH6kiGk/s1600/morgturn.jpg
This skin is just awesome. I love the whole La Llorona myth this is based on from Latin American culture, and I think the ghost bride is a pretty great look for Morgana. Plus, I love brides and zombies, so this is a great mix.

Honorable Mentions:
Risen Fiddlesticks
http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-EfI7E_Z1h-A/VSXMrrYWkdI/AAAAAAAAn8s/dH2474TkKBk/s1600/fiddleturn.jpg
I also like mummified zombies, so this is a fun skin too. I love the scarabs in place of crows, and the Egypt theme is just fun.

Program Camille
https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-vEcmsYeE_Ps/WDQvzV0oE4I/AAAAAAAAY3Y/yTm65x34KNc4rYd-kJ1n2digPUR9cifYwCLcB/s640/cam1turn.jpg
I love this, more so than the PROJECT line - I love the play on her being an aggressive AI that's bent on deleting malfunctioning software or obsolete machines.

5: {{champion:41}} Dreadnova Gangplank
I don't play Gangplank, but this skin has a theme that I LOVE. I watch anime from time to time, and it has a very anime feel (Super Galaxy does too but not in a dark, gritty way). It just opens some amazing possibilities for new skin ideas that can swirl around my head very easily.

4: {{champion:10}} Iron Inquisitor Kayle
The splash art for this skin really drew me in as beforehand there wasn't anything else like it in my eyes. In game the skin matches so well with her particles you could mistake it for begin an awesome version of the base skin. The dark somber tones just match with the righteous fire.

3: {{champion:29}} Medieval Twitch
I wanted this skin ever since I learned of its existence (I started playing after Refer-A-Friend was shut down), and now that it's had its splash updated I'm salivating even more over it! Maybe one day they'll allow me to get it...

2: {{champion:57}} Meowkai
Probably my favorite joke skin in the game (although that Pug'Maw skin is interesting) and now that it has Chromas I'm for sure getting it next time I can. It's just so silly that it's great. I love it.

1: {{champion:29}}  Pickpocket Twitch
First skin I ever bought, it's what made me main my main, and I bought it purely for the Sly Cooper reference. Shoot arrows with guns ftw!
I keep thinking Dread Nova Graves would make an incredible skin. I like your list! The new Maokai chromas are amazing.

Now as much as I would love to say "Armour of the 5th Age Taric, Pool Party Taric, Emerald Taric, Bloodstone Taric, Explorer Ezreal." for the memes and it wouldn't be entirely wrong lets do this properly.

1)  5th Age Taric
https://static.lolwallpapers.net/2016/04/5704c534e1952.jpg

This is the skin that made me love Taric and League.  It has helped influence my life far more than a video game ever should.

2)  Super Galaxy Rumble
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/kderuRbEyv0/maxresdefault.jpg

I loved this skin before watching Gurren Lagann and I love it even more after.  It is smooth, streamlined, and has some of the most amazing quotes.
"Nothing can stop me.  Not even a wall of tigers with smaller tigers for teeth!"

3) Arcade Hecarim
http://riot-web-static.s3.amazonaws.com/images/news/August_2013/gamescom_skins/Arcade_Hecarim_Splash.jpg
It is a mecha rainbow Unicorn that plays music.  What isn't to love?  This skin is starting to show it's age a bit but I still love it despite having had a falling out with Hecarim when they made Q changes a season or so ago.

4) Popstar/Arcade Ahri
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/pahri-articlebanner_1.jpg?itok=RHP00eOA https://i.ytimg.com/vi/eBtmQ9bCkQQ/maxresdefault.jpg

Well I couldn't choose just one or the other so I went with both for very different reasons.  Popstar Ahri is a hilarious skin that amuses people to see.  I love it for that reason alone.  Arcade is much more of a work of art and I can really appreciate the effort and extra animations that went into it.

5) Classic Nautilus
http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Nautilus_0.jpg
Not what you were expecting?  Well Nautilus is my second most played champion, and only a few thousand mastery points behind Taric, the champion I am literally named after.  Despite owning every Taric skin, having sunk hundreds of dollars into LoL, having bought DJ Sona 3 different times for me and my friends, and owning every Ahri skin even though she is only my 5th highest mastery champion I don't own a Nautilus skin.  Now I love the champ, but honestly his base skin has always struck me harder than any of his skins.  It is well done, feels like Nautilus, and just doesn't need anything added to it.

Honorable mentions include:
Draven Draven, Order of the Banana Soraka, Vandal Vlad, Giant Enemy Crabgot, Neon Strike/Demon Vi, All Taric skins except maybe bloodstone, Bloodmoon Kalista, Explorer Ezreal, Lunar Revel Azir (go!), and Dj Sona.

Basically I like a lot of skins.

5. Pug'Maw
4. Pug'Maw
3. Pug'Maw
2. Pug'Maw
1. Pug'Maw

1. Dark Star Thresh
2. Star Guardian Jinx
3. Gatekeeper Galio (the new version of course)
4. Dragon Sorceress Zyra
5. Nightmare Tryndamere

I, personally, tend to love a lot of skins within the same theme, so I'm going to list my five favorite skin themes and specific skins within those themes (in no particular order, because I like them all TT~TT)

**Heartseeker/Sweetheart Skins**

Particularly Heartseeker {{champion:22}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:110}}  and Sweetheart {{champion:37}}.
I'm just basic and love the Valentine's Day theme. I also love the pinks and reds and pastel hair. It's all very pleasantly aesthetic. Also, as an Art History major, I love Sweetheart Sona's splash art with the Renaissance-esque art in the background. I personally think it's one of the best backgrounds in a splash art in terms of nodding towards classicism.
The Ashe and Annie splash arts also remind me of Alice in Wonderland, so that's a plus. Now, normally whenever I play Ashe, Quinn, or Sona (I do not own Varus, but I do appreciate that hot damn skin), I am playing their Heartseeker/Sweetheart skin.
Since I love this skin line so much, I would love to see more supports receive a Sweetheart skin (Sweetheart Braum, anyone? Sweetheart Janna?)
**
Star Guardian Skins**

Of course I love Star Guardian {{champion:99}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:40}}. At the moment, I only own Star Guardian Lux, but I am very eager to throw money at Riot when Janna and Jinx go on sale. I just love these skins for the throwback to my magical-girl-filled childhood, though they remind me more of Madoka Magica (even though they are a direct nod to Sailor Moon). I have to admit that Janna is my favorite, simply because 1) she's JANNA and I'm biased, 2) she's PURPLE and I'm biased, and 3) Zephyr is so cute <3
I do admit, though, I was disappointed with Poppy and Lulu. Lulu more than Poppyl; I think Lulu could have been a lot better.

**Bewitching Skins**

Bewitching {{champion:25}} and {{champion:18}} are two of my favorite skins. While I don't play Tristana a lot, for some reason I've gotten the majority of her skins through the mystery chests--yet even then Bewitching has become my absolute favorite of all her skins (previously it was Buccaneer). I like the skin so much, I'm tempted to play Tristana more often. I love her recall the most, with the cute little kitty <3
Bewitching Morgana, I've been spamming that every time I play Morg that I forget I have her other nice skins. I think, aesthetically, this is Morgana at her best. I imagine that this is what Morgana looked like in her prime before she was a fallen angel, and she's ABSOLUTELY BEAUTIFUL. I also love the details to her dress--I think it gives her more volume as a figure and more personality. Overall, 10/10 skin, so glad I bought it.
**
Arcade Skins**

Specifically {{champion:21}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:81}} and {{champion:103}}, in which the only ones I do not own are Ahri and Ezreal.
I think Arcade MF was one of the first skins I bought, and it's the skin that got me playing MF. Then I was on a wild hunt trying to get Arcade Sona (I kept missing it on sale, but I finally got it for 70% off in my Snowdown Shop), and I got Arcade Riven for free from a contest.
I naturally play Arcade MF and Sona a lot more than Riven because I am a horrid Riven player, but every time I play these skins I'm always having a lot more fun. The little pixel animations are perfect.

**Pharaoh Skins**

My passion in life is Ancient Egypt, so naturally I love the designs for Pharaoh {{champion:32}} {{champion:75}} and {{champion:76}}.
I don't own any of these skins--the only champion I own of the three is Amumu, and the Pharaoh skin is legacy), but I am biased and I love their designs. And while there are other loosely related skins to this theme (such as Risen {{champion:9}}, Desert {{champion:86}}, the Sandstorm skins, and the Guardian of the Sands skins), I would greatly appreciate it if Riot would keep making more Egyptian skins.
Slightly related, I love the classical Greek Muse {{champion:37}} and Mythic {{champion:69}}, and would also like to see more skins along that line (you know, other than {{champion:80}}).

**Honorable Mentions**

Individual skins that I love (and own, and play roughly 90% of the time when I'm playing the champion):

Popstar {{champion:103}} (because, as I have mentioned, I am basic)
Snow Day {{champion:90}} (because I am biased and this is the only skin for Malz I own, though generally I am not impressed with his other skins on an aesthetic level)
The Dragon Trainer Skins for {{champion:117}} and {{champion:18}} (though I don't own Tristana's skin, I still love this theme. STILL WAITING FOR DRAGON TRAINER {{champion:133}} , RITO. BECAUSE QUINN SHOULD TOTALLY RIDE A DRAGON AS HER ULT. WHY IS THIS NOT A THING YET. /rant)
Zombie {{champion:63}} (I don't even care if I am the worst Brand you have ever seen, everything about this skin is GLORIOUS, and the quotes are just so damn funny, especially when he's "singing", like "Not easy being green...and dead", and "Every day I'm shambling..." XD)
Frosted {{champion:81}} (because I'M BASIC and he reminds me of Jack Frost, and I'm BASIC AF)

Okay, I'll stop now. :)

I find Pharaoh Nasus to be an ugly skin. I only bought so I could own all the nasus skins and it was on sale so meh. Zombie brand is dank af, I can agree on that. A lot of people like Frosted Ezreal, not sure why.

To be fair, I don't even own Nasus, and I think the Pharaoh skin is wasted on him since it doesn't really look all that different from his basic concept...but the point is that I like the concept in general lol.
They sort of need to update it as well as galaxy. Or at least their splash.

a lot of people like frosted ezreal because it has a nice color palette, i think. his other skins are mostly a bunch of recolors, pulsefire was cool when it came out but pales compared to other skins lately, and some people don't like the look of arcade. it's simple enough to be likeable by a lot of people and hold up decently when riot updates ezreal's textures.

1) DJ Sona
http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-olCOJnrLI9o/VO0gV0SqDoI/AAAAAAAABiw/YZhkzJejYeQ/s1600/sona1turn.jpg

2) Arcade Ahri

https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4vM6ssc8iq4/WESEEdZOX1I/AAAAAAAAZbA/Vet1rxH8VmcT5wW2w2KDnO9f_hdj0fwzwCLcB/s1600/braumturn.jpg

4) Moo Cow Alistar (instabuy for me, i play quite a bit of Alistar so I might as well buy it + the derp cow chroma, AKA Peridot)
https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-mxGI2SOcrmA/WL-SuxrBvgI/AAAAAAAAfiU/MM7-AEokfIsyDDRl6nFrnIFl4CrvKNtAgCLcB/s1600/alistarturn.jpg https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ynM9CGxn_PE/WL8YxjhVvtI/AAAAAAAAfX8/9XiaYa1w_SQ2_We_RhxMV4d1TP4Cib1SQCLcB/s1600/Alistar_12.jpg

5) Meowkai (it aint over yet, cuz i'm planning on buying 2 of his upcoming chromas: Tanzanite and Amethyst)
https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-rca_yyLcb48/VunuSdRk67I/AAAAAAAAMSA/GZEll65tb4gThrdxJZ_RekDQ1XTgcyneg/s1600/meowkaiturn.jpg https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kXpsda6pgd8/WL8Yzf0m-yI/AAAAAAAAfZY/7AaLfHeU9rkDtlJZuHutcxbHPdN1YlS7wCLcB/s1600/Meowkai_11.jpg https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-P9Cq2zxvm9E/WL8Yzo7YZcI/AAAAAAAAfZs/EGUOzPlDsioMR_SrCrcDf4mmEOiF4-QuQCLcB/s1600/Meowkai_15.jpg
Nice. I'd love to hear your reasons for why you like those skins!

DJ Sona is my #1 because... dat ass, on another note, one of the best skins in the game imo

Arcade Ahri is #2 because it's her first 1350 rp skin (COLOR CHANGING TAILS)

Santa Braum is self-explanatory, can't get enough of that glorious recall

Moo Cow Alistar is on PBE right now and I'm going to buy it (also these chromas)

Meowkai is also self-explanatory (chromas + you throw rainbow kitties at people)
Nice. DJ Sona is definitely in my top 10 skins, and once i get her and get enough money i'm gonna get that skin.

oh yeah, forgot my honorable mentions:
Silent Night Sona
http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-f4wD2v1D12Y/U8hoHDsr2vI/AAAAAAAAUDQ/l8vxhIKuBDs/s1600/silzent.jpg

Arcade Sona

1: Midnight Ahri
2: Final Boss Veigar
3: Divine Soraka
4: Arcade Ahri
5: Silent Night Sona

1) Basic skin Pantheon. 

Spartans are cool. Wish they gave him pteruges like his splash art though.  And of course could use a spit shine, but the basic aesthetic is perfect. 


2) Traditiona Trundle

Same reason as OP, really. Trundle was cooler before the rework. 

3) Gentleman Cho'Gath

One of the earliest silly skins and honestly still one of my favorites. 

4) Highlander Tryndamere

A roughly realistically sized greatsword? Yes please!  It even has a ricasso how great is that?

5) Grey Warwick

I don't like the robot crap they added to Warwick. Grey removed it, and looks cool to boot.
Never knew that Highland Tryndamere gave him a more realistic sword.  I respect Trynd more now.
It's not perfect, it's about as wide as his head. But that's to be expected all weapons get wider to make them easily seen. But with that in mind it's a pretty good representation.
Nice. I hope you can figure out a 5th skin! remember, you don't have to own the skin to put it on your list.

5. Definitely Not Udyr -  I love this skin line, I think its hilarious and while I dont play or own any udyr skin, and am using definitely not blitz for quite a long time, I still love this skin more because its simply hilarious

4. Rumble in the Jungle - another skin for a champion I dont really play, the point here being that this skin was THE shit when I started playing , everybody played Rumble and every single one had this skin, it might not even be considered good but it reminds me of fun times in season 1 when I started playing

3. PAX Jax - of course I dont own this skin, but Jax was my first champion ever and I played him all the way to level 30 and beyond, he has a special place in my heart and this skin is imo his best skin despite being 8 years old

2. Winter Wonder Orianna - I am an Ori main ever since I started to understand the gameplay, I have 5000 games on her over the years but I never liked any of her skins untill this lovely piece of art came into League and I fell in love immediately

1. Gentleman ChoGath - I dont know why it is, but I just adore this skin, everything about it is cool, the voiceover and jokes remind me of times when I was a kid watching Monty Python with my family, he looks classy and funny and that is more important to me than any special effect or shit, the skin has character and thats why its my favorite in the game

#5 Favorite, Debonair Jayce, I love everything about high society, and Jayce is just top in a tux.

4. Samta Braum.  This is literally 100% because fanservice. Like hot diggity damn he can.... nevermind not finishing that sentence xD

3. Any of the Arclight skins. I love the "holy magics" type of persona in a character. And turning Vayne, Vel, Varus all into what are meant to represent THE guardians instead of monsters/hunters is awesome.


2. Dreadknight Garen/ Infernal Nasus. When you take what is meant to be a hero, guardian and the peoples man, and turn them into a walking force of evil that you can imagine sitting in a throne and ordering the masses executed... I am all in

1. Pool Part Mundo. Nothing better than chasing down people in a hawaiin T shirt, khaki shorts and throwing Ukeleles at them.

**1.) Warring Kingdoms Azir**

https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-wZL9VxRc8wU/WEcdXRF6ZRI/AAAAAAABAcw/MZ7st3xQwdk25PYLrgs8bx8La9nKnPrIQCEw/s640/Azir_Splash_4.jpg

This skin is glorious. IMO one of the best skins they ever made.

---------------

**2.) Dark Star Thresh**

https://lolstatic-a.akamaihd.net/frontpage/apps/prod/dark_star_thresh/de_DE/e07b3cca1b375ce609fe564b6b687963500e13ed/assets/assets/images/downloads/Riot_Games_Dark_Star_Thresh_Wallpaper_1920x1200.jpg

Do I need to explain why?

----------------------

**3.) Star Guardian Jinx**

https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ES1Ao21PUMI/V-BRs66USAI/AAAAAAAAUn4/2kQ3CPS8zoEms2iQDgDM3Gn7qa_KJ8SKgCEw/s1920/Jinx_1920x1080.jpg

Awesome lines, awesome emote spam, awesome sounds, for an awesome champion with an awesome personality. (No, I don't main her, I suck at ADC)

------------------

**4.) Armor of the Fifth Age Taric**

 https://static.lolwallpapers.net/2016/04/5704c534e1952.jpg

Because Gems are truely outrageous. And this skins is too.

-------------------

**5.) Order of the Banana Soraka**

https://elohub.com/images/champions/soraka/order_of_the_banana_soraka_skin.jpg

Hate the champ but love the skin.

I don't know if this post is still relevant, but you posted on mine so I figured I should offer something to one of yours, and I like talking about skins.

1) Vi
I saw someone below mention a classic skin (Nautilus, props, I feel the same way about him vs his skins) so I'm doing the same. I have a rule where I don't buy a skin unless A: buying it tells Riot that I want more skins _like_ it, or B: it looks better than the classic skin and I plan on replacing that classic skin with the better looking premium skin. Vi's basic aesthetic is amazing, and I personally love it more than anything else the game has, despite me not maining the pink-haired punk anymore.

2) Debonair Vi
Did I say it needed to be better than the classic? This is a close second. It's Vi, just as punk and pink-hair as ever, but in a suit. Yeah, a fucking suit, sharp as a knife. Need I say more?

3) Popstar Ahri
I never play this skin anymore, but it's Girls' Generation Genie skin, and that's enough.

4) Dragon Trainer Tristana
HER GUN IS A BABY DRAGON

5) Aether Wing Kayle
Another champ I never play, but her dance is Night of Fire which is one of my favorite things on this planet. Plus, it's just cool.

Honorable mentions:
Captain Fortune; PROJECT series; Program series (both because cyberpunk is my favorite genre ever); Orianna (classic and sewn chaos); Blackfrost Anivia; Sejuani's rework "classic" skin (I bought Sej to show Riot that I supported the direction of less sexualized female models); and Slayer Jinx.

Honestly, it's hard to decide. This is really just things I value on a scale of 1) Vi 2) anything else. Riot has done such an incredible job creating the skins in League. I don't play League much anymore (though I'll definitely make an extended return with the release of Xayah and Rakan), but I always have a hard time validating the purchase of skins in other games 'cause I'm always thinking "League does it better." From updates icons, textures, particle and sound effects, voice lines, champ-specific interactions, and animations, League skins are the complete cosmetic package. You get what you pay for, and I'm never disappointed. Vi's still the best.~~ and she's hella gay fight me~~

1.) Redeemed Riven. This just gives me a good feeling to look at and play with. The art and symbolism when related to Riven's actual lore is incredible. The look of hope for the future on Riven's face in her splash and the bright shiny armor just makes me happy. 
http://pre11.deviantart.net/ff6d/th/pre/f/2011/277/3/2/lol___redeemed_exile_by_knockwurst-d4buedo.jpg

2.) Arcade Riven. As a Riven main, my top two skins are both for Riven. I tried to avoid this if I could, but I would be lying if Arcade Riven is not my number two skin. This is the skin I play with when I'm just looking to have some casual fun (or if I'm trying to relax under pressure.) As a pretty awesome bonus, as a fighting game player, the street fighter eske "KO!" that plays when Riven dies is just amazing and makes me feel at home here in league. 
http://apollo-na-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/1439246433/ArcadeRivenComparison.jpg

3.) Iron Scale Shyvana. This one is mostly in the splash. The more human look of Shyvana is rather nice and the skin feels rather humble. Not to mention the skin itself is rather clean and nice to look at as well for a cheap 520(?) RP skin. 
https://elohub.com/images/champions/shyvana/ironscale_shyvana_skin_large.jpg

4.) Valkyrie Leona. I love the angelic look of this one. A beautiful, holy protector of harmony and peace sounds just about right when it comes to this skin and it fits Leona to a T. 
http://www.leagueoflegendsskins.com/images/champions/splash/Leona_1.jpg

5.) Yellow Jacket Shen. Hint #1: Fighting game player. Hint #2: "GET OVER HERE!"
https://static.lolwallpapers.net/2016/01/Yellow-Jacket-Shen.jpg

1. Traditional Trundle
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-lDVfovS6xfE/UX8ETH-PmTI/AAAAAAAAEEk/Dz2i8zVlMUs/s1600/trundle.png
Trundle is one of my favourite champions. I didn't own him before the update and I always thought his update, although beautiful, was unnecessary. I liked Trundle's old voice a lot better than his new one and his old laugh is contagious to me. Luckily, when Riot released the hextech crafting system I got this skin in my first chest. That was one of my happiest league moments; I laughed as I emote spammed with Trundle every game and told my annoyed friends "Riot should've never given me this skin."

2. Dragon Sorceress Zyra
https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-tDZtOUDnfFg/WK4LcLXQu9I/AAAAAAAAeac/FQ2wLxguddAfxHo5HxBA242Bdwiu0sv7QCLcB/s1600/zyraturn.jpg
Up until recently, I was a Zyra main for 3+ years and it's been so long since Haunted Zyra came out. At one point I vowed to not spend any money on League until she got a new skin. Of course, I ended up breaking that a few times (I'm weak) but the release of this skin was highly anticipated for me. 

3. Goth Annie
http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-twoU4Q2yqoc/UPd33Cs_n5I/AAAAAAAAOOY/bq7pP9cgQQs/s1600/goith.png
I don't play much annie these days, but when I did play her this was the only skin that I bought. Even though I didn't want most of the champions in the bundle, I patiently grinded out every last influence point to get every champion in the starter pack bundle so I could purchase just the skin.  I love the tattered and stitched up tibbers, and the whole aesthetic. It's basically a 1350 skin for 975. I just wish her runny mascara didn't get wiped off and she wasn't given a smile in her new splash art.

4. Pool Party Dr Mundo
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-zkLobEWUSHs/VYTzqvaP8pI/AAAAAAAAEG4/-RY0KFekB4M/s640/mundoturn.jpg
I really believed we would make it to the goal during the pool party event and get this for free. I like how relaxed Mundo looks in this skin and the ukulele cleaver sound is my favourite. I spent so many hours playing longer than I normally would've in groups with complete strangers for team up and pool party points. Not long after failing to reach the global goal, I ended up getting a massive My Shop discount on it and buying it. 

5. Renektoy
https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-f8Mw-pRRNM0/WL-WUqwiPvI/AAAAAAAAfjc/j4cujHwTOkweQcMboNdz9siga7uMgpZcQCEw/s640/reneturn.jpg
Not too long ago I was contemplating buying a Renekton skin since I've always had an interest in the champion (I break out renekton support all the time in norms) and I was considering maining him in top lane. Only problem I had was, all of renekton's skins are too macho for me. I wanted something that made renekton look cute or silly. The next day, Renektoy showed up on Surrender at 20. The fact that he still menacingly says "who's next on the chopping block" while being a children's toy is hilarious to me. I love the particle effect on Dominus and his death animation is perfect. He looks like a toy story or Small Soldiers character.




Honourable mentions:

Spectral Fiddlesticks
https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-HyNMRON7OCE/V3Dqtr5xHpI/AAAAAAAAQro/53sR1Xtt2HIjBYaxfuvQCqNyqvipvIwwACKgB/s1600/fiddleturn.jpg
This is yet another blessing from Riot. I got this skin that one time they gave us mystery skins for good behaviour. I like it because the strength of the glow effect is hilariously high. It's a simple skin, but I use it over my other Fiddlestick skin because it was a gift from Rito Game.

Order of the Lotus Karma
http://3.bp.blogspot.com/--StR4WayNCw/VC2hBUX0DuI/AAAAAAAAaQY/1hIZPYuf1vg/s1600/karma2.jpg
waited so long for it to be purchasable in the client and it was worth when it finally showed in the shop.

Forecast Janna
http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-V6p9jSprD5Y/Ugmg4huxe6I/AAAAAAAAGMM/fvtwuCx0NoQ/s1600/hahafh.png
The voiceover 

Warring Kingdoms Garen
https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ea3lYnA1mGM/WEcuBIxuDXI/AAAAAAAAZpc/v9B6Z7kwG1MDOQLsrUbnBhP1KvKCuyKVQCLcB/s640/garenturn.jpg
The green visuals of his passive go best with the colours of this skin imo. The particles look amazing and I prefer the smoother movements of this skin to the movements of Steel Legion who was always too meaty and rigid for my taste.
